title: Shawarma Legend Utils - v
description: This is a utility for the game Shawarma Legend.

messages.config_not_found: Config file not found. Creating a new one...
messages.config_error: Failed to create config file, please check if you have permissions to write into the folder.
messages.first_time_guide: This guide will help you set hotkeys to control the game.
messages.config_incorrect: Config file incorrect! Please refer to the example config file on Github and change your config file, or delete this config file and rerun the program to generate a new one.
messages.internal_error: [Internal error: line number out of range, in func:insertLines] This is definitely a bug, if you are seeing this, please report this on Github immediately.
